title: Bigpiggy01
author: Bigpiggy01
content: I'm helping develop an onchain binary options system, basically UTXO based defi more or less and am looking for a chunk of testnet BTC to help develop the platform.Roughly 2-300 should do the trick.If anyone wants to help a brother out mzgBBeqZvZgJbMxtfvGUBgF8WdSxiJjMt4Am also happy to tip some USDT or BTC for that size chunk in which case hit me up in DMs with tx ids and a message signed from the sending address.If anyone is interested in what it is we are building, it's just about to go into Alpha and you're welcome on the Discord https://discord.gg/6zw5jHyShK

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 01, 2023, 06:19:32 PMI'm helping develop an onchain binary options system, basically UTXO based defi more or less and am looking for a chunk of testnet BTC to help develop the platform.Roughly 2-300 should do the trick.If anyone wants to help a brother out mzgBBeqZvZgJbMxtfvGUBgF8WdSxiJjMt4Am also happy to tip some USDT or BTC for that size chunk in which case hit me up in DMs with tx ids and a message signed from the sending address.If anyone is interested in what it is we are building, it's just about to go into Alpha and you're welcome on the Discord https://discord.gg/6zw5jHyShK Testnet BTC is meant to be free and it's something you shouldn't pay for based on my belief since you're going to use it on something important. I have some testnet BTC coins that have been scooped years ago, I will check my offline note if I still have the wallet that contains the testnet coin.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 01, 2023, 06:19:32 PMI'm helping develop an onchain binary options system, basically UTXO based defi more or less and am looking for a chunk of testnet BTC to help develop the platform.Roughly 2-300 should do the trick.You should probably discuss this with notblox1 as he was offering such a service of giving free testnet Bitcoins to those who want to use them for good purposes. I think his offer is still available I will be posting his thread link below:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5278247.msg55264315#msg55264315I hope he will be helpful for you in your search for the testnet Bitcoins. Hope he will send you some testnet Bitcoins, and your project will begin to work. Best of luck my friend!

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 01, 2023, 06:19:32 PMI'm helping develop an onchain binary options system, basically UTXO based defi more or less and am looking for a chunk of testnet BTC to help develop the platform. Can you tell me if this onchain binary options system project is related with Bitcoin or with some altcoin?I can send you some Bitcoin testnet coins but it's not going to be anywhere near 300.If you can send me more information about this project I will gladly review it and consider sending you some.More testnet coins can be sent if you pledge to return most of them after testing phase is finished.

comments.author: Bigpiggy01
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on May 02, 2023, 10:29:46 AMQuote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 01, 2023, 06:19:32 PMRoughly 2-300 should do the trick.2-300 in what unit? BTC? mBTC? If you mean 2-300 testnet BTC, it's hard to obtain such amount and you might want to use regtest[1] instead. But if what you want to test can't be achieved with regtest, consider mining testnet BTC[2-3] or take a loan with collateral[4].[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5268794.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415861.0[3] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415335.0[4] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5306684.0Thanks man really appreciate it.

comments.author: Bigpiggy01
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on May 02, 2023, 11:28:20 AMQuote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 01, 2023, 06:19:32 PMI'm helping develop an onchain binary options system, basically UTXO based defi more or less and am looking for a chunk of testnet BTC to help develop the platform. Can you tell me if this onchain binary options system project is related with Bitcoin or with some altcoin?I can send you some Bitcoin testnet coins but it's not going to be anywhere near 300.If you can send me more information about this project I will gladly review it and consider sending you some.More testnet coins can be sent if you pledge to return most of them after testing phase is finished.It's currently in prealpha testing with a single other testnet coin integrated RTM. But that is a different integration model based on time locks. What is planned with BTC/LTC/FIRO and the project own coin is op_return based options taking so deposits to specified addresses with the correct tag on op_return= a position ZMQ timestamping is using on incoming tx for entry against public market data, on expiry it's timestamped again to determine win or loss payments are made on the hour following win or loss determination (if doing some of the very short timeframe options offered may need to wait till hour after full confirmation of TX). So no accounts and 100% transparency.It's not revolutionary but a "defi" option on native BTC and we're opensourcing the parsing/matching engine 12 months into being 100% live.And yes I will happily send back Tbtc or refill a faucet of your choice once done with the tbtc aplha.Forgot to add that this is for testing the house side wallet handling and a hackathon with prizes for anyone able to move tBTC from any of the platform wallets.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 02, 2023, 03:51:55 PMForgot to add that this is for testing the house side wallet handling and a hackathon with prizes for anyone able to move tBTC from any of the platform wallets.Please send me some links with more information about project and hackathon using forum personal messages.I will review everything you send me and decide the amount of testnet coins I am going to send.Give me few days to review everything.

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 02, 2023, 02:53:11 PMThanks man really appreciate it.I can see that you seem to ignore my message maybe you think I'm lying or one of the naive lower-rank users of this forum. In the meantime, I checked my tBTC wallet and I can only send you 0.46 testnetBTC .TX info677b9bc374ba47c597c31990ab561fab2f50ee9730df1310450b3754b6ba37a1

comments.author: Bigpiggy01
comments.body: Quote from: Myleschetty on May 03, 2023, 02:39:30 PMQuote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 02, 2023, 02:53:11 PMThanks man really appreciate it.I can see that you seem to ignore my message maybe you think I'm lying or one of the naive lower-rank users of this forum. In the meantime, I checked my tBTC wallet and I can only send you 0.46 testnetBTC .TX info677b9bc374ba47c597c31990ab561fab2f50ee9730df1310450b3754b6ba37a1Regtest is great for private testing but for live testing nothing beats either full on testnet or an own testnet(setting up your own btc testnet). The problem with setting up an own btc testnet is that you're then expecting potential users to run at least a gitcompare on your integrated testnet to verify it and the second you start doing that users start dropping off hurting the overall project. I appreciate the help man! The nicer a balance the platform has during the hackathon (yes it's tBTC) the easier it is to motivate some people to give breaking it a try.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: I finished doing my review for the links you sent me and I already sent testnet coins to you, transaction should be complete by now.Like we agreed in PM, please send testnet coins back when you finished testing, because I dont have unlimited supply and other developers may need them.Thank you.

comments.author: Bigpiggy01
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on May 04, 2023, 03:24:15 PMI finished doing my review for the links you sent me and I already sent testnet coins to you, transaction should be complete by now.Like we agreed in PM, please send testnet coins back when you finished testing, because I dont have unlimited supply and other developers may need them.Thank you.Much appreciated! Hitting a few blocks on the testnet as well so should get there!

comments.body: Quote from: Bigpiggy01 on May 01, 2023, 06:19:32 PMI'm helping develop an onchain binary options system, basically UTXO based defi more or less and am looking for a chunk of testnet BTC to help develop the platform.Roughly 2-300 should do the trick.  Faucet & more here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5092596.msg61190955#msg61190955 But if you really need hundreds for your business today : https://altquick.com/exchange/market/BitcoinTestnet

In the meantime, I checked my tBTC wallet and I can only send you 0.46 testnetBTC .TX info677b9bc374ba47c597c31990ab561fab2f50ee9730df1310450b3754b6ba37a1I appreciate the help man! The nicer a balance the platform has during the hackathon (yes it's tBTC) the easier it is to motivate some people to give breaking it a try.You're welcome and I can see that you have gotten the needed tBTC coin. I wish you success in your project.Quote from: d3bt3 on May 05, 2023, 09:14:21 AMFaucet & more here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5092596.msg61190955#msg61190955 But if you really need hundreds for your business today : https://altquick.com/exchange/market/BitcoinTestnet  I believe it will be hard and time consuming for him to get the need tBTC through the faucet which is the reason why he decide to ask for help.

comments.author: d3bt3
comments.body: Quote from: Myleschetty on May 06, 2023, 10:52:20 PMQuote from: d3bt3 on May 05, 2023, 09:14:21 AMFaucet & more here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5092596.msg61190955#msg61190955 But if you really need hundreds for your business today : https://altquick.com/exchange/market/BitcoinTestnet  I believe it will be hard and time consuming for him to get the need tBTC through the faucet which is the reason why he decide to ask for help.You are correct!That exchange has 100+ tBTC testnet bitcoins on offers; the price is the set by the participants, of course.

comments.author: Bigpiggy01
comments.body: Well, if anyone is curious about what this is for:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZiP7AK_YYiQTestnet live on https://nowput.finance/Discord: https://discord.gg/6zw5jHyShKAnn thread and more details on the website https://nowput.org once close to launch, just coming out of prealpha now.
